thread.title: Microsoft sets October 6 event for Windows 10 devices
thread.title_full: Microsoft sets October 6 event for Windows 10 devices

author: Reuters
title: Microsoft sets October 6 event for Windows 10 devices
text:
Reuters | September 15, 2015, 08.56 am The new OS is part of the company's push to win back lost ground in tablets and mobiles (Representational Image) Microsoft Corp sent out invitations on Monday for an event on October 6, where it is expected to unveil new devices that run on Windows 10, its latest operating system.
"We're eager to share some exciting news about Windows 10 devices," a Microsoft spokeswoman said.
Microsoft is expected to unveil devices such as the Surface Pro 4 tablet, the Microsoft Band 2 wearable fitness tracker and the latest Lumia smartphones at the event.
Microsoft launched Windows 10 in July, almost three years after the launch of its previous operating system, Windows 8.
The new OS, designed to work across laptops, desktops and smartphones, is part of the company's push to win back lost ground in tablets and mobiles.
